title: 04/14/2021 - Hour 2 - Irving vs Schroder
itunes:title: 04/14/2021 - Hour 2 - Irving vs Schroder
description:
LaVar Arrington, TJ Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress are filling in for Dan Patrick and the Danettes, discussing whether it’s right or wrong to use the n-word when playing professional sports following the altercation between Dennis Schoder and Kyrie Irving. The guys debate who they’d rather have on their team between Devin Booker and Donovan Mitchell and they breakdown whether or not Steph Curry is the greatest point guard of all-time.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
